snippet.title: How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The once prosperous kingdom of Avon now lies in tatters with nothing left in its coffers and a pitiful four citizens to its name. Yet even at its darkest hour, Princess Ariadne is still determined to restore it to its former glory. Will her perseverance carry her through?

How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/how-to-build-a-magnificent-kingdom/

How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/
